title: Help choose the font!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014233958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logotype_4363.jpg)
  
Please help find pick a font similar to the one that in the picture.  
But! Font to display arrows (↑ and ↓).
author: InetBUG

comments.content:
Wow this is the actual "Lcs}tron" logo!

Seriously, now, try dafont.com. Here: [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303&page=2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014233958/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303&page=2 "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303&page=2")

Adam's seems to be a similar font.

Cheers!
